titleStmt.title: A vindication of the doctrine of the holy and ever blessed Trinity and the Incarnation of the Son of God occasioned by the Brief notes on the Creed of St. Athanasius and the Brief history of the Unitarians or Socinians and containing an answer to both / by William Sherlock.
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
